member.name: M:Appleseed.Content.Web.ModulesDailyDilbertImage.Page_Load(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary:
The Page_Load server event handler on this User Control is used to stream the current comic from the DailyDilbert web service and output an image for use on the web control
The image returned is a thumbnail based on a % of the original picture size. If no % reduction then the image will be viewed at 100%. if (ModuleID cannot be determined, then the image will be viewed at 100%. Since when clicking on the comic from the module, ModuleID is not sent, it displays the image in a new window at 100%.
